title: Realme shares Realme UI 3.0 early access roadmap for the Realme 9 5G and Realme 9i
content:
In October last year, Realme shared the Realme UI 3.0 early access release timeline for a bunch of its devices. Since then, Realme has released early access and open beta builds of the latest version of its custom Android skin based on Android 12 to a bunch of phones, including the Realme X7 Max 5G,

The post Realme shares Realme UI 3.0 early access roadmap for the Realme 9 5G and Realme 9i appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Realme has updated the Realme UI 3.0 early access roadmap for Q2 2022 and included two more devices -- the Realme 9 5G and Realme 9i.
